programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Explore the vibrant world of K-pop beyond the hits with "Essential K-pop B-Side Tracks". This playlist brings you hidden gems and fan favorites that shine just as bright as the title songs. With catchy melodies and fresh sounds, each track adds a new color to your favorite artists’ music. Let these standout B-sides brighten your day and become your next go-to songs! programme.title: Golden Disc Awards
programme.desc: Welcome to the Golden Disc Awards! Get ready for ITZY, SKZ, TWICE: JYPE Essential, a playlist that brings together the ultimate hits from JYP Entertainment’s powerhouse artists. From ITZY’s confident anthems and Stray Kids’ high-energy performances to TWICE’s iconic melodies, experience the very best of JYPE’s signature sound. Get ready to relive legendary moments and feel the undeniable impact of these chart-topping artists! (Track List: ITZY - DALLA DALLA + ICY + WANNABE + Not Shy / Stray Kids - God's Menu + Back Door + BANG BANG BANG (BIG BANG COVER) + SUPER BOARD + FREEZE + CASE 143 / TWICE - Cry For Me + More & More + Ice Cream + Feel Special + YES or YES + FANCY + Stuck In My Head + BDZ + What is Love? + The Best Thing I Ever Did + SAY YES + Heart Shaker + Like OOH-AHH + Cheer Up + TT + Heart Shaker + Knock Knock + SIGNAL + LIKEY + Cheer Up + TT + Like OOH-AHH)

programme.title: NEW KPOP Choice
programme.desc: Experience the refreshing vibe of summer with the "Essential Summer Soundtrack". From the thrill of road trips to the warmth of sunlit days, this playlist brings summer to life through music. With upbeat energy, catchy choruses, and breezy rhythms, each track captures the essence of what makes K-pop summers unforgettable. Let the music carry you into your own sun-drenched story.
